title: Labs...
content: I am a student from 2nd sem, I wanted to know how much do labs contribute to your overall gpa, considering that they have only 1 credit, and I'm not doing well in both of them (I currently am in physics cycle), so if anyone could clarify my query, it would be much appreciated.

comments.body: Well, labs are one place people usually get an S grade to help boost their GPA.
